Program Sources
Any possible sources of programs which we may have ov rlooked
thus far.
What about member stations? Shall I solicit all stations to
submit program possibilities, or bring them up as the stations
offer them?
Possible sources for school programs.
lave had suggestions that we try to obtain some commercially
originated network programs such as the CBS University of
the Air, You Are There, etc* Should we investigate?
